attributes.action: foster carers to be reassessed as no one knows what goes on behind closed doors.
attributes.additional_details: there are studies that show 80 percent of children a day in foster their emotional wellbeing and phisical wellbeing are not being met. I also have proof on this through my own experience.
attributes.background: to make sure children are being not being told that they will be put in care home because foster carer can't cope with sibling behaviour that has a negative impact on emotional wellbeing children being too scared to talk to anyone as frightened the will be put in care home.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you mean by "foster carers to be reassessed". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
